summary: Fortune seeker Barry Storm stumbles onto some clues that may lead him to the fabulous Lost Dutchman Mine, but others have tried and been murdered.
cast: Ida Lupino|Glenn Ford|Gig Young|William Prince|Edgar Buchanan|Will Geer|Paul Ford|Victor Adamson|Richard Alexander|Trevor Bardette|Baynes Barron|Hank Bell|Ray Beltram|Chris Willow Bird|Paul E. title: La fiebre del oro
